All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminController
 
AdminControllerInterface
AdminControllerInterface defines the contract for admin-related operations in the controller layer.
AdminDao
The AdminDao class provides methods to perform database operations related to admin entities.
AdminLogin
Handles admin login functionality.
Cart
Represents a cart entity that stores information about products added by a customer.
CartController
 
CartControllerInterface
CartControllerInterface defines the contract for cart-related operations in the controller layer.
CartDao
The CartDao class provides methods to perform database operations related to cart entities.
CartDaoTest
 
Customer
This customer class represents a customer with an ID, name, email, and password.
CustomerDao
UserDao handles database operations related to customers.
CustomerNotFoundException
Custom exception class to represent the scenario where a customer is not found.
CustomerNotFoundTest
 
DBUtil
The DBUtil class provides utility methods for database operations.
Ecommerce
The E-commerce class represents the main entry point for the e-commerce platform.
Order
Represents an order entity in the system.
OrderController
 
OrderControllerInterface
OrderControllerInterface defines the contract for order-related operations in the controller layer.
OrderDao
OrderDao handles database operations related to orders.
OrderDaoTest
 
OrderNotFoundException
Custom exception class to represent the scenario where an order is not found.
Product
Represents a product with an ID, name, price, description, and stock quantity.
ProductController
Controller class for managing products.
ProductControllerInterface
The ProductControllerInterface interface provides methods to manage products in the e-commerce platform.
ProductDao
ProductDao handles database operations related to products.
ProductDaoTest
 
ProductNotFoundException
Custom exception class to represent the scenario where a product is not found.
ProductNotFoundTest
 
UserController
 
UserControllerInterface
UserControllerInterface defines the contract for user-related operations in the controller layer.
UserLogin
Handles user login functionality.
